  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_4a00ec49b65c7b735aeec375bde16a8268452845</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_4a00ec49b65c7b735aeec375bde16a8268452845</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Compounds and mixtures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mittel und Mischungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Composés et mélanges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compostos e misturas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Residui e miscele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενώσεις και μίγματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Compuestos y mezclas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show how copper and oxygen atoms combine to form copper oxide (top), and how a mixture of hydrogen and oxygen form a compound called water (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen, wie Kupfer und 
Sauerstoffatome kombinieren, um Kupferoxid (Oberseite) zu bilden und 
wie eine Mischung des Wasserstoffs und Sauerstoff ein 
zusammengesetztes benanntes Wasser (Unterseite) bildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent comment les atomes de 
en cuivre et d'oxygène combinent pour former l'oxyde de cuivre 
(dessus), et comment un mélange d'hydrogène et l'oxygène forment 
une eau appelée composée (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram como os átomos do 
cobre e de oxigênio combinam para dar forma ao óxido de cobre 
(alto), e como uma mistura do hidrogênio e o oxigênio dá forma a 
uma água chamada composta (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano come gli atomi di 
ossigeno e del rame uniscono per formare l'ossido di rame (parte 
superiore) e come una miscela di idrogeno e l'ossigeno forma un'acqua 
chiamata compound (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις επιδεικνύουν πώς τα άτομα 
χαλκού και οξυγόνου συνδυάζουν να διαμορφώσουν το οξείδιο χαλκού
(κορυφή), και πώς ένα μίγμα μορφής υδρογόνου και οξυγόνου μια 
ένωση κάλεσε το ύδωρ (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran cómo los átomos 
del cobre y de oxígeno combinan para formar el óxido de cobre 
(tapa), y cómo una mezcla del hidrógeno y el oxígeno forma un agua 
llamada compuesta (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kupferoxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mischung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">oxyde de cuivre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mélange</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">óxido de cobre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mistura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ossido di rame</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">miscela</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οξείδιο χαλκού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μίγμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">óxido de cobre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mezcla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">agua</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
